name: openvpn
tagline: An open source VPN solution for secure network connections
description: OpenVPN is an open-source VPN protocol and software suite that enables secure point-to-point and site-to-site connections. It features strong encryption, cross-platform support, and can be deployed on self-hosted servers.

features.title: Certificate Authentication
features.description: Use PKI with client certificates for strong authentication without password vulnerabilities

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Maintain VPN connections even when client IP addresses change on mobile or residential networks

features.title: High Performance
features.description: Reduce bandwidth usage with LZO compression for faster performance on limited connections

features.title: Logging And Monitoring
features.description: Track connection events, bandwidth usage, and authentication attempts for security auditing
